products.name: HAVIT LED RGB Backlit Wired Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
products.description: Built with the all-new blue mechanical switches, help you take your game to the next level with more speed and precision. Provide a combination of great gaming performance with tactile feedback and an audible click for typing.

products.name: Rii RK400 Large Size 7 Color LED Backlit Gaming Keyboard Mouse Combo Bundle UK Layout Black
products.description: RM400 is a bundle that includes a 104 keys PC gaming keyboard and mouse. Press the "Scroll Lock" then the keyboard will show 7 colours, if you do not want the keyboard light up just press the "Scroll Lock" again then the backlit will disappear. Lite version interface design, can perfect match your workspace.
